content:
Hi all!

We're an Australian startup, on the lookout for remote talent with expertise in:

  • Probabilistic Graphical Models
  • Machine Learning/AI
  • Haskell
  • Category Theory
  • Bachelorâ€™s or higher in Math/Stats/Comp Sci. Advanced degrees preferred.

Must have work rights in Australia.

Interested? Please DM me.

Thank You!

Naso

David Michael Roberts said:

All or just some expertise?

Absolutely, having expertise in any of these domains and a keenness to learn more is what we're looking for. If this resonates with you or someone you know, please DM me :blush:

Cool to see another startup here :blush:

You probably know this, but we have used deel.com to hire remotely. We had staff in France, Thailand and China hired via deel.com. That could open up the talent pool :blush:
